Package org.apache.wiki.api.exceptions

JSPWiki's API exceptions package.

See:
          Description

Exception Summary
FilterException A generic PageFilter exception.
NoRequiredPropertyException Marks an erroneus jspwiki.properties file.
NoSuchVariableException Marks that no such variable was located.
PluginException Provides a generic PluginException.
ProviderException This exception represents the superclass of all exceptions that providers may throw.
RedirectException This exception may be thrown if a filter wants to reject something and redirect the user elsewhere.
WikiException A generic Wiki exception.
WikiI18nException A generic Wiki exception, meant to carry key & args to construct i18n messages to show meaningful messages to end-user.
 

Package org.apache.wiki.api.exceptions Description

JSPWiki's API exceptions package. This package holds all the exceptions used by JSPWiki APIs.

Package Specification
